summary: Add a getUpdateHandle() method to workflowHandle to obtain an UpdateHandle given update and workflow execution identifiers.
userImpact: Users can retrieve an UpdateHandle for an existing workflow execution to interact with pending or completed updates.
proposedFix: Implement workflowHandle.getUpdateHandle(...) method accepting update and workflow execution identifiers
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented in the TypeScript SDK
keyQuote: Add `workflowHandle.getUpdateHandle(...)` method to obtain an `UpdateHandle` given update and workflow execution identifiers.
